Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: A.J.
Reviews.Content: I bought this model from other place almost 2 years ago. My whole family is totally satisfied with this TV.  The color, saturation and brightness are great. I did not do any ajustment. Worked out of box perfectly. I am looking at this today because I want to find out if I can buy a Google Chromecast to put it in the USB port. As there was only one single star comments before me, I feel oblidged to express my satisfaction with this TV.

Reviews.Title: never buy a samsung....
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: It worked the first day, next day would not connect to the HDMI - neither one!  The repair center was worthless in trying to set an appt to repair, took it back and got my money back, total POS!! I have LG and Panasonic TV's - will purchase one of those instead.

ProductInfo.Features:
•60" LED HDTV lets you enjoy movies in cinema quality
•Full HD 1080p resolution for a clear picture with vibrant colors and images
•100,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio provides a detailed picture for a high-quality viewing experience
•Two 10W built-in speakers and Dolby Digital Plus and Dolby Pulse create an outstanding listening experience
•SRS TheaterSound HD delivers superior advanced virtual surround sound
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN60EH6050F 60" LED HDTV 1080p 120Hz
